title: Police probing racial abuse of Ashley Cole at Swindon-Man City game
shortDescription: Wiltshire Police have opened an investigation after Ashley Cole was racially abused during Friday's FA Cup third-round tie between Swindon and Man City.

title: Rashford: I have endless respect for Rangnick and coaching staff
shortDescription: Marcus Rashford has said he has "endless respect" for Manchester United interim manager Ralf Rangnick and his coaching staff.

title: FA Cup third round overall preview: Chesterfield face Chelsea
shortDescription: Team news, match stats and how to follow ahead of a bumper weekend of FA Cup third round action as Premier League clubs enter the competition.

title: Millwall to investigate homophobic chant | Palace's Olise struck by bottle
shortDescription: Crystal Palace's Michael Olise was struck by a bottle and homophobic chants were directed at team-mate Conor Gallagher in the FA Cup win over Millwall at The Den.

title: Olise inspires Crystal Palace to win as trouble mars FA Cup tie
shortDescription: A stunning second-half display by Michael Olise helped Crystal Palace come from behind to beat rivals Millwall 2-1, although crowd incidents marred the FA Cup tie.

title: Late Pearson header knocks Burnley out of FA Cup
shortDescription: Matty Pearson's late header saw Huddersfield come from behind to dump Premier League side Burnley out of the FA Cup with a 2-1 win at Turf Moor.

title: Arsenal's Maitland-Niles completes Roma loan move
shortDescription: Ainsley Maitland-Niles has completed a loan move to Roma from Arsenal until the end of the season.

title: Liverpool 'hoping' Klopp back on touchline vs Shrewsbury
shortDescription: Liverpool are hoping Jurgen Klopp is back in the dugout for Sunday's home FA Cup tie against Shrewsbury.

title: Wycombe deny Sunderland in six-goal thriller
shortDescription: Wycombe captain Joe Jacobson struck in the eighth minute of stoppage time to snatch a 3-3 draw against fellow League One promotion contenders Sunderland at Adams Park.

title: Saturday's fixtures & scores
shortDescription: Keep up to date with all the FA Cup ties, plus action from the EFL and other leagues around Europe...

title: 'We've missed her' - Houghton back training after four months out
shortDescription: Manchester City have received a "big boost" with the return of captain Steph Houghton from injury after four months out, says manager Gareth Taylor.

title: Barca reject salary claims about Pique, Alba, Busquets
shortDescription: Barcelona have rejected an "erroneous" report that revealed the salaries of Sergio Busquets, Jordi Alba and Gerard Pique.

title: Pogba yet to decide Man Utd future | Midfielder facing another month out
shortDescription: Paul Pogba has not been offered a new contract since last summer and is still deciding whether to extend his stay at Old Trafford.

title: Chandarana: I've come full-circle at Blackburn
shortDescription: Blackburn midfielder Millie Chandarana says she has come full-circle after returning from Italy to the club where she made her senior debut in football as a 17-year-old.
